Senior Data Scientist

Join LinkedIn's data science team and help us build the future of professional networking. We are looking for an experienced Data Scientist with a passion for large-scale data analysis and machine learning.

In this role, you will develop models to improve member engagement and discover new insights into the global workforce. You will work with diverse datasets and use advanced statistical techniques to solve complex problems.

Qualifications: - PhD or MS in a quantitative field - 4+ years of industry experience - Proficiency in SQL and Python/R - Experience with distributed computing frameworks like Spark

LinkedIn is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. We are an equal opportunity employer and do not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status.
